alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Floyd; Knott; Magoffin (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 4:01PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Knott, west central Floyd, east central Breathitt and southeastern Magoffin Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 400 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Decoy, or 12 miles northwest of Hindman, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Vail, Evanston and Tiptop around 410 PM EDT. Waldo and Duco around 415 PM EDT. Orchard, Gunlock, Mid, Ordway, Fredville, Gapville and Gypsy around 420 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Pyramid, Hippo, Bosco, Hueysville, Eastern and Brainard. THIS INCLUDES Kentucky Highway 80 in Floyd County between mile markers 4 and 5. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
